oauth.title: Intelbras Guardian - Login
oauth.description:
To complete authentication:

1. Open the link below in your browser:

**{auth_url}**

2. Login with your Intelbras account

3. After login, you will be redirected to a page with a URL containing `code=` and `state=`

4. Copy the **complete URL** from the browser address bar and paste below

API: {api_url}

data.callback_url: Callback URL (paste the complete URL after login)

configure_unified_alarm.title: Configure Unified Alarm
configure_unified_alarm.description:
Select a device with multiple partitions to configure the unified alarm.

The unified alarm allows you to control multiple partitions with 'Home' and 'Away' modes.

select_partitions.title: Configure Partitions
select_partitions.description:
Configure which partitions will be armed in each mode.

**Home**: Arms only selected partitions (e.g., perimeter sensors)
**Away**: Arms all selected partitions (e.g., leaving home)

reauth.title: Intelbras Guardian - Re-authenticate
reauth.description:

2. Login with your Intelbras account

3. After login, copy the **complete URL** from the browser address bar and paste below

API: {api_url}
